Description: Green malachite (?) scaraboid: possibly fake. Engraved on the base with an ibex(?) walking to the right, a 'wsr' sign before it, a large bird(?) behind and two bent lotus flowers(?) over its back. Abraded. Deposit(?).
Bibliographic references: Giveon R 1985a / Egyptian scarabs from Western Asia from the collections of the British Museum (p.188, no.37)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Rev Greville John Chester
